body: Hmmm ... You are right Ludvig. The component works ONLY when it outputs at least 2 shades (for the HBObjWShades give an output). Please open an issue at the github ... unless this is what Saeran is working on ... not sure. See attached some way to work this around in the meanwhile. Sorry for this confusion. -A.
